mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, food.* from (select * from food order by food_id asc) food) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * 5+1) and rnum <= (#{page} * 5)
mapper.insert: insert into food ( food_id, food_name, food_content, food_photo, food_addr, food_tel, food_hour, food_feat, food_type, food_menu, food_cost, food_rate ) values ( food_seq.nextval, #{food_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{food_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{food_photo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{food_addr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{food_tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{food_hour, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{food_feat, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{food_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{food_menu, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{food_cost, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{food_rate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rnum, query.* from (select place_name, place_addr, place_type from place where place_addr like '%' || #{city, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' union select food_name, food_addr, food_type from food where food_addr like '%' || #{city, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' union select room_name, room_addr, room_type from room where room_addr like '%' || #{city, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' ) query ) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 6 ORDER BY dbms_random.value
mapper.update: update food set food_name=#{food_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, food_content=#{food_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, food_photo=#{food_photo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, food_addr=#{food_addr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, food_tel=#{food_tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, food_hour=#{food_hour, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, food_feat=#{food_feat, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, food_type=#{food_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, food_menu=#{food_menu, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, food_cost=#{food_cost, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, food_rate=#{food_rate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where food_id=#{food_id}
mapper.select: select count(food_id) from foodbookmark where id=#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and food_id=#{food_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into foodbookmark ( food_mark_id, food_id, id ) values ( foodbookmark_seq.nextval, #{food_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: delete from foodbookmark where id=#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and food_id=#{food_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
